bodyfatplus25: My clothes are feeling a little tighter.
bodyfatplus50: My clothes are feeling pretty tight.
bodyfatplus75: My clothes are feeling very tight.
bodyfatminus75: My clothes feel better now, but they're still very tight.
bodyfatminus50: My clothes feel better now, but they're still pretty tight.
bodyfatminus25: My clothes feel better now, but they're still a little tight.
bodyfatperfect: My clothes fit perfectly now. I should try to avoid this in the future.
bodyfatworst: My clothes are so tight, they might burst! I really need to diet!
stomachwillgrow: My stomach is getting bigger. I can hold more food now.
stomachwillshrink: My stomach is getting a little smaller. I can hold less food now.
